title: IP to Blue Essence Conversion Rate
body:
Hi, I was wondering what the conversion rate of IP to blue essence will be in the new system, like whether or not it's a good idea to buy champion shards (1700 IP) right now or not. I was intending to reroll them into a new champ, but if say the next 5 shards I buy turn out to be duds, and the unlocks aren't what I'd like, would I have been better off just hoarding the IP until the Preseason currency exchange?

Is IP going to be a 1:1 ratio to Blue Essence, or like Blue Essence (currently) will it have a scaling ratio. I read through the entire 'post' or statement about the changes, and got a direct ratio for blue essence to new blue essence (1:6.5 exchange rate), will IP be better or worse than that?

-> On a side note, are key fragment drops lesser than before? I came back after a 5 month break to find them exceedingly rare

replies.body:
Blue Essence will be multiplied by 6.5 and then added to your current IP value. That will be your new Blue Essence total. AFAIK, the prices on stuff in the shop will stay the same, but will have a big ol' BE tag taped over the IP. A champion costing 6300 IP will now cost 6300 BE.


Side Note: Key fragments haven't been changed recently.

Hey, you said it is going to be a multiplier of 6.5 but the LOL preseason spotlight says it's going to be 17.8 (https://youtu.be/BGb4MovgqDY?t=318 at 5:18) Is that a typo in the video or which one is it going to be?

Yesss Thanks so much for posting this! This could be a crucial change! I am also curious if the conversion mulitplier is 6.5 or 17.8?
6.5 is the conversion for NA and all other regions except Garena!
17.8 is **ONLY** for the Garena Region. Every other region is set at 6.5 (unless there's another weird one out there I don't know about)

Yes, but the current IP total, what will it's exchange ratio become? (1:1, 1 IP for 1 Blue Essence, etc. ?)

Thanks!

That was in my first sentence unless I'm misunderstanding your question entirely xD

> Blue Essence will be multiplied by 6.5 and then added to your current IP value. That will be your new Blue Essence total.

a 6300 IP champ is going to cost 6300Blue, and current Blue is getting scaled accordingly.

I mean current currency exchange, say I have 2k IP, will that be 2k Blue Essence, 5k, etc.? And will it definitely stay the same value afterwards?

I'm looking at somewhere in the realm of 35k Blue Essence once the pre season hits (not account for IP)
